snippet.title: Benzema gives Real Madrid 1-0 win over Bayern
snippet.description: Real Madrid hopes a narrow home win put it in position to reach the Champions League final for the first time since 2002.

snippet.title: Benzema gives Real Madrid 1-0 win over Bayern
snippet.description: Real Madrid hopes a narrow home win put it in position to reach the Champions League final for the first time since 2002.

snippet.title: Video: Real Madrid 2, Barcelona 1
snippet.description: Gareth Bale scored in the late stages as Real Madrid won Copa del Rey for the 19th time, defeating Barcelona.

snippet.title: Liverpool, Sterling top this week's AP soccer poll
snippet.description: Liverpool tops The Associated Press global soccer poll this week for the fifth time this season and for the second consecutive week after its 3-2 win over Norwich kept it atop the English Premier League.

snippet.title: Olympiakos beats Real Madrid 78-76, avoids sweep
snippet.description: Greece's two Euroleague representatives, winners of the past three competitions, staved off elimination by winning closely contested home games on Monday.

snippet.title: Guardiola, Mourinho back in Madrid for CL semis
snippet.description: Madrid will be the center of the soccer world this week when Real Madrid hosts Bayern Munich and Atletico Madrid welcomes Chelsea in the Champions League semifinals.

snippet.title: MLS moves benefit Parkhurst, Edu
snippet.description: Since returning to MLS from Europe, Crew defender Michael Parkhurst and Union midfielder Maurice Edu have bolstered their World Cup hopes.

snippet.title: Liverpool closes in on Premier League title
snippet.description: Liverpool secured a return to the Champions League on Sunday.

snippet.title: Barcelona faces end of winning era
snippet.description: Barring a drastic turn of fortune, Barcelona is on the brink of finishing its worst season since former coach Pep Guardiola molded it into one of the most successful teams to play soccer.
